```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r cars}
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)

table <- read.csv("output.csv")

table %>% tibble() %>%
      kbl(
      align = "c",
      booktabs = TRUE,
      longtable = TRUE,
      linesep = "",
      caption = paste0("Centrality Score for three word pairs using ")
      ) %>%
  kable_paper(
        position = "center",
        latex_options = c("striped", "repeat_header", "scale_down"),
        stripe_color = "gray!15",
        font_size = 15
    )

```
